Package com.intellij.ui.render

Class RenderingUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.ui.render.RenderingUtil

  • public final class RenderingUtil
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Key<java.lang.Boolean> ALWAYS_PAINT_SELECTION_AS_FOCUSED
      This key can be set to a list or a tree to paint unfocused selection as focused.
      static Key<javax.swing.JComponent> FOCUSABLE_SIBLING
      This key allows to paint focused selection even if a component does not have a focus.

    • Field Detail

      • ALWAYS_PAINT_SELECTION_AS_FOCUSED

        public static final Key<java.lang.Boolean> ALWAYS_PAINT_SELECTION_AS_FOCUSED
        This key can be set to a list or a tree to paint unfocused selection as focused.
        See Also:
        JComponent.putClientProperty(java.lang.Object, java.lang.Object)

      • FOCUSABLE_SIBLING

        public static final Key<javax.swing.JComponent> FOCUSABLE_SIBLING
        This key allows to paint focused selection even if a component does not have a focus. Our tree table implementations use a table as a focusable sibling of a tree. In such case the table colors will be used to paint the tree.
